Action.author: suryalnvs
Action.body: I tried the above scenario multiple times using *OTE testname=ORD-97 TX=100000 Channels=1 Orderers=3 ordererType=kafka kafka-brokers=3 oteSpy=OFF producersPerCh=1* on commit *3b40efaee8584fd2662c59c0f7fc5a1a18c38f58*, Date: Fri Jun 2 03:00:52 2017 +0000 in vagrant and TLS enabled, but haven't seen the behavior as mentioned above, *{color:#14892c}so issue is no more reproducible.{color}*

Action.author: weeds
Action.body: Scott - should we close this now, given new levels of code etc,.?
